body.name: Water Dental Flosser with Electric Toothbrush, One Switch Between Tooth Brush & Water Floss, 3 in 1 Teeth Cleaning Kit with 4 Modes, Water Flosser Portable for Travel and Home (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 20 mins
Or fastest pickup Saturday, February 17. Order within 3 hrs 20 mins
features: Double Clean: UNINGOPI Electric Toothbrush can spray water and brush your teeth at the same time, helps you clean every corner of your mouth, effectively remove food debris hidden in the depths.

4 Modes & 3 Cleaning Heads: The Water Floss has 4 cleaning modes: Clean, Soft, WH./PL.and Polish. First-time and sensitive users can choose Soft mode. There are also 3 different cleaning heads, you can choose different brush heads according to different cleaning needs.
Smart Reminder Function: Built-in 2-minute smart timer and 30-second pause reminder function to avoid brushing your teeth for too long. Encourage users to develop good brushing habits.
Waterproof & Rechargeable: This Teeth Cleaning Kit is IPX7 waterproof and can be used in the bathroom. With a USB-C charging port, high compatibility, portable travel.
Package: 1x Device Body, 4x Toothbrush Head, 1x Jet Tip, 1x Hook-Like Cleaning Head, 1x Detachable Hose, 1x Charging Cable, 1x User Manual.
body.description: Why Choose 3-in-1 Water Flosser with Electric Toothbrush? Convenient, Effective, A new option for cleaning UNINGOPI Electric Toothbrush and Water Flosser can spray water and brush your teeth at the same time, double cleaning teeth. Tankless design, easy to travel. Easy to use as long as you have a water bottle. Comes with many extre parts. There are 4 replacement brush heads, you can use it with your family.

What’s in the Box: 1x Device Body 4x Toothbrush Head 1x Jet Tip 1x Hook-Like Cleaning Head 1x Detachable Hose 1x Charging Cable 1x User Manual Why Choose 3-in-1 Water Flosser with Electric Toothbrush? Convenient, Effective, A new option for cleaning UNINGOPI Electric Toothbrush and Water Flosser can spray water and brush your teeth at the same time, double cleaning teeth. Tankless design, easy to travel. Easy to use as long as you have a water bottle. Comes with many extre parts. There are 4 replacement brush heads, you can use it with your family.

Cleaning Teeth The Tooth Brush cleans the surfaces of the teeth, while the Water Flosser removes food debris between gum and teeth for a double clean. USB rechargeable Water Flosser & Electric Toothbrush With a USB-C charging port. Compatible with power bank, computer, laptop. IPX7 Waterproof You can use the Electric Toothbrush when showering. The internal leak-proof drainage design that gives you a safe and comfortable cleaning experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great! So easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: This electric toothbrush/flosser works great!. The toothbrush has multiple settings, which allowed me to easily get used to using an electric toothbrush. The flosser feature is extremely effective and easy to use. Plus, since there is no huge water container attached to the base, it is extremely convenient and portable-you just get a small container/drinking glass or whatever you have available and put the water in the container. The hose from the flosser attachment goes into the container and provides the water needed for the flosser (you can use the flosser alone or while brushing). This product is great, and the price was excellent! We ordered a second one for my wife and are extremely happy we did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two in one Brush/ Floss
reviews.reviewText: Love that it's compact, has water pic attachments, 4 brush heads and usb charging. Cleans very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Replaces 3 dental appliances!
reviews.reviewText: I am a fanatic about my teeth, probably since I paid for my own braces. This is a very clever dental tool! It brushes, water flosses and pics plaque. It has replaced 3 appliances and freed up quite a bit of space in my small bathroom! It's easy to use and am very pleased with the operation! I would buy again!! My only criticism is that it can roll on counter when placed down on its side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just use it as a water flosser & it works fine. The charge lasts about a week & it only takes an hour to completely recharge it. Much better than the big name brands & it doesn't leak!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dental tool
reviews.reviewText: I'm old fashioned and was hesitant to try this new-fangled combo set but I'm certainly glad I took the plunge. It is incredible!!! The pick feature is comfortably strong and removes so much from between the teeth; switch to the brush and you get wonderfully clean teeth. Plus you can flip on the water again at the end while brushing and rinse any residue away that the pick didn't get. Two shots at cleaning between teeth and get super clean teeth with just one single tool, who could ask for more. One more thing I like is the small space that is required to store it, rather than a whole shelf for my other two large separate cleaning tools. The water vessel in this picture is an empty "Power Aide" container that is perfect for this operation. It holds the right amount of water for the whole procedure with a little to spare. Since I drink one a day, I swap out my bottle often.This is such a wonderful dental tool and I know you will be just as happy as I that you gave it a try. In addition, the price is reasonable for all the features you get. I'm happy to put my old clunky equipment to rest. My dentist is going to be very happy with me at my next checkup, yay!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Home and Traveling
reviews.reviewText: This has been very convenient, the water flosser is strong and reliable and I appreciate the additional brush heads that's included in the box. Also travel friendly, the battery lasts over a week and only needing a cup of water for the water flosser. Easy to use, and sits in my hand naturally, not bulky or heavy but sturdy. Worth the price and would recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade their toothbrush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It only vibrates
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush only vibrates, it does not spin at all. Also the flossing feature is not great. You have to put a tube in a cup to suck up the water to have it squirt out. Not a very good design. All that said, it does clean your teeth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again
reviews.reviewText: I like this toothbrush, sleek, easy to use, like that it can be a water pick too. The only thing I don’t love is it takes a second to turn off. I sometimes don’t use it when I’m in a hurry because turning it off feels stressful when I’m rushing out the door.
I have water pik version and bought this because i moved countries. This is an excellent design and very portable. I haven't used much and will update if any changes
